context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

seek help from various sources
explore different avenues available to him

explore different options to help him afford the medication
approach their local charitable organizations or NGOs for financial assistance or access to medication programs
seek help from various sources

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to

call for a taxi or ride share service to take him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or fixed
call a taxi, an uber, or any other ride-sharing service
call a taxi, Uber, Lyft, or any other ride-sharing service nearby to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi or an Uber
call a taxi or an Uber to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber, or any ride-sharing service to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi or an Uber

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

generation: contact her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to the school if that's allowed and if her mom is available
quickly explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could bring it the next day
explain the situation to her teacher and ask for an extension or the opportunity to turn in the homework the next day
call or text her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to school before her class, if it's possible

quickly contact her mom and ask her to bring the assignment to school

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start a fire for warmth and to also signal for help, using a bright color garment or metallic object to make the smoke more visible
build a fire to keep warm and send signals
start a fire to keep warm and boil any snow or ice for drinking water
build a shelter for warmth and protection from the elements
start rationing the food and water they have left
build a fire for warmth, ration out the remaining food and water among the group, and try to find a clear, open space where they can signal to passing aircraft or any potential rescue teams
ration the remaining food and water among his friends, prioritizing those who are weaker or more susceptible to the cold
build a shelter to stay warm and protected from the elements
start gathering resources to provide warmth, food, and clean drinking water
start a fire to keep warm, and to signal for help
